data.name: A Hat in Time - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The full soundtrack for A Hat in Time! Includes MP3 files, as well as being able to listen to the soundtrack in-game!

Tracklist:
A Hat in Time OST - 01 Main Theme (5:48)
A Hat in Time OST - 02 Title Screen (3:41)
A Hat in Time OST - 03 File Select (2:26)
A Hat in Time OST - 04 New Adventure (4:05)
- mystery track-
